title: 【出納組公告】總務處出納組臨櫃收費服務至上班日下午4點截止[Cashier Group Announcement] The collection service of the Cashier Divison of the General Affairs Office ends at 4 p.m. on working days
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處 - 許紹峯 - yummy@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906361
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【出納組公告】總務處出納組臨櫃收費服務至上班日下午4點截止[Cashier Group Announcement] The collection service of the Cashier Divison of the General Affairs Office ends at 4 p.m. on working days
日期： Thu, 12 Sep 2024 08:22:06 +0800

各位師長、同仁大家好：
為求於當日完成現今票據清結作業，落實業務法遵與內控，維護校務基金財務安
全，總務處出納組臨櫃收費服務時間調整為至上班日下午4點截止，逾時煩請於
次一上班日再行洽辦，謝謝您的配合！
敬祝 平安
總務處出納組 敬啟

Hello, teachers and colleagues:
The current cashier service hours of the General
Affairs Office are until 5 p.m. on working days. In
order to complete the current bill settlement
operation on the same day, implement business
legal compliance and internal control, and comply
with the school's travel time regulations, the
cashier service hours are adjusted to The deadline

is 4pm on working days. If you are overdue, please
try again on the next working day. Thank you for
your cooperation!

Wish you peace

Sincerely, Cashier Divison of General Affairs Office
